snippet.title: Crop Chronicles - Intro
snippet.description:
Dive into a touching tale where Grandpa Enzo's magical farming legacy lives on through his grandson. Grandpa, with hands that whispered to the earth, leaves behind a world of green wonders and the mission to keep this magic alive after he's gone. Filled with memories and armed with Enzo's wisdom, the grandson steps into his boots, ready to face the challenge with a smile. It's a journey of growth, laughter, and the enduring power of love. Join us as we explore how every plant sown is a tribute to Grandpa's dream, teaching us that love never truly leaves; it takes root in ways we never imagined.

Add Crop Chronicles now on Steam Wishlist! https://bit.ly/48Wo0dL

Visit our website for more info https://guayacan.studio

#farmingsim #pixelart #indiegame #timemanagement #farming
